app_id.desc: Required if calling with user token.

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

expression_attributes.desc: A map of attributes referenced in expression.

expression_values.desc: A map of values referenced in expression.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to evaluate for a given request (not necessarily the number of matching items). If the given request dataset size exceeds 1 MB before reaching the limit, the returned item count will likely be less than the limit. In any case where there are more items available beyond an imposed limit, a `next_cursor` value will be provided for use in subsequent requests.

errors.access_denied: Not authorized to access the datastore.
